New Records: Beau Brieske threw his fastest pitch of the year at 98.6 mph.
Key Match Events: Spencer Torkelson hit a home run after a 10-pitch walk by Jace Jung.
Kenta Maeda settled in and dispatched three Angels hitters after a visit from catcher Jake Rogers.
Jake Rogers threw out Jo Adell attempting to steal second base in the seventh inning.
Beau Brieske struck out Logan O'Hoppe with a 98.6 mph fastball to end the eighth inning.
Jason Foley secured his 19th save of the season.
Post-Match Reflections: Spencer Torkelson emphasized the importance of staying focused and not looking too far ahead.
Manager A.J. Hinch highlighted the significance of small plays in the game and their impact on bullpen usage.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Detroit Tigers have won six in a row and 13 of their past 16 games.
The Tigers are now only 4 1/2 games back from a wild-card spot with 28 games to play.
